examples.example: 大家可以随便发表自己的观点，共同探讨问题。

translate.english: Everyone can freely express their own views and jointly discuss problems.

examples.example: 我们可以随便聊聊，分享生活中的趣事。

translate.english: We can chat casually and share interesting things in life.

examples.example: 我可以随便选一本喜欢的书来阅读，享受惬意的时光。

translate.english: I can casually choose a favorite book to read and enjoy the pleasant time.
